altTitles.ja: 肉便器システム年代記

description.en:
Kimiko Matsuda is part of the sex relief club at school, or something along those lines. Those of you who have read the Kazahara series by Archives I did a while back will know the idea. She’s so good at it she decides to go ahead and get her sex slave licence. In doing so, we get a history of how such a system came to be. You can thank the World Health Organisation for establishing the International Sex Slave Commission in 2002, for starters. Lol.

1-4. NIKUBENKI SYSTEM CHRONICLE
5. One Day Of Crime Prevention Exercises
6. Sexual Deviation - Girl A's Standardized Results
7. Sexual Deviation - Girl B's Standardized Results
8. NIKUBENKI SYSTEM CHRONICLE 2049
